name: Pomoc w nagłym wypadku
text: Wybierz dowolnego badacza w twojej lokalizacji. Wylecz 2 obrażenia z danego badacza lub z dowolnego atutu z cechą [[Sprzymierzeniec]], który ten badacz kontroluje.

name: Brat Xavier
text:
Dostajesz +1 [willpower].
Brat Xavier może otrzymać obrażenia i/lub punkty przerażenia zadawane innym badaczom w twojej lokalizacji.
Brat Xavier zostaje pokonany: zadaj 2 obrażenia dowolnemu wrogowi w twojej lokalizacji.

flavor: "That's the worst plan I've ever heard. Well, what are we waiting for?"
name: "I've got a plan!"
text: Fight. This attack uses [intellect]. You deal +1 damage for this attack for each clue you have (max +3 damage).

flavor: Searchers after horror haunt strange, far places. - H. P. Lovecraft, "The Picture in the House"
name: Pathfinder
text: [free]During your turn, if you are not engaged with any enemies, exhaust Pathfinder: Move to a connecting location.

flavor: It may not be legal, but it gets the job done.
name: Contraband
text: Choose an asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Double the number of ammo or supply tokens on that asset.

name: Adaptable
text:
Permanent.
In between each game of a campaign, you may swap up to two level 0 cards out of your deck in exchange for an equal number of level 0 cards. (You must still follow all deckbuilding rules for your investigator).

flavor: Some things, once seen, can't be unseen.
name: Delve Too Deep
text: In player order, each investigator draws 1 card from the top of the encounter deck. Then, add Delve Too Deep to the victory display.

name: Song of the Dead
text: Uses (5 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +1 [willpower] for this attack. If a [skull] symbol is revealed during this attack, this attack deals +2 damage.

name: Oops!
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while attacking an enemy engaged with you.
Deal this attack's damage to a different enemy at your location.

name: Gaśnica
text: [action]: Walka. Do tego ataku dostajesz +1 [combat]. [action] Wygnaj Gaśnicę: Wymykanie się. Do tego testu dostajesz +3 [agility]. Jeśli test powiedzie się, dodatkowo wymknij się wszystkim wrogom będącym w zwarciu z tobą.

name: Flara
text: Wybierz jedno: - Walka. Do tego ataku dostajesz +3 [combat] I zadajesz +2 obrażenia. Wygnaj Flarę. - Przeszukaj 9 wierzchnich kart z talii dowolnego badacza w poszukiwaniu karty atutu z cechą [[Sprzymierzeniec]] i umieść ją w grze pod twoją kontrolą. Następnie wygnaj Flarę. Potasuj przeszukaną talię.

flavor: A good pipe can calm the most frazzled of nerves.
name: Smoking Pipe
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[free]Spend 1 supply, exhaust Smoking Pipe, and take 1 damage: Heal 1 horror.

flavor: Do not exceed the recommended dosage.
name: Painkillers
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[free]Spend 1 supply, exhaust Painkillers, and take 1 horror: Heal 1 damage.
